info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 5:54PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms east of Idahome and the Interstate 84 and 86 Interchange moving northeast toward Neeley and Rockland through 645 PM MDT... At 550 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles south of Lake Walcott to near Cold Water Rest Area to 11 miles east of Malta. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Moderate to brief heavy rain, wind gusts to 35 mph, pea to half inch sized hail, and occasional lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Motorists traveling along Interstate 86 should be prepared for water on roadways and possible hydroplaning. Locations impacted include... Neeley, Rockland, Cold Water Rest Area, Yale Rest Area, Massacre Rocks, Sublett Reservoir and Interstate 84 And 86 Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If traveling along the Interstate, consider slowing down. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
